mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT COUNTY FROM (SELECT * FROM yzl_xb WHERE city = #{anumber}) as xb

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM yzl_menu WHERE menu_id IN ( SELECT menu_id FROM yzl_role_menu WHERE role_id = ( SELECT role_id FROM yzl_user_role WHERE user_id = ( SELECT id FROM yzl_user WHERE id = #{id}))) ) xb WHERE pid = 9

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM yzl_menu WHERE menu_id IN ( SELECT menu_id FROM yzl_role_menu WHERE role_id = ( SELECT role_id FROM yzl_user_role WHERE user_id = ( SELECT id FROM yzl_user WHERE id = #{id}))) ) xb WHERE pid = #{menuId}
select DISTINCT cityCode ,city , flag from yzl_district
SELECT Anumber , county FROM yzl_district WHERE flag = #{cityCode}
